text: The flag of Toluca () It is colored white and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of the stripes. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. ==Design and symbolism== The meaning of the colors of the flag are as follows: Name Color HEX Code White #FFFFFF The civil flag of Toluca there is the same colors of the Mexican national flag are as follows: Name Color HEX Code Symbol Green #006847 Land White #FFFFFF Religion Red #C90016 Blood of the heroes == History == The fisrt flag of Toluca municipality was a tricolor of green, white, and red with a coat of arms charged in the center of the white stripe. While the meaning of the colors has changed over time, these three colors were adopted by flag of the Three Guarantees in honor of the country's independence insurgents. Currently, green, white and red decorations are placed throughout the municipality every year to honor the heroes, giving rise to the tricolor Toluca flag that flies every year in the Plaza de los MÃ¡rtires and in the town hall. Although the Toluca Municipality the state capital, does not have an official flag, inside the council room of the town hall there is a white flag with the municipality's coat of arms. ==Related pages== * Flags of municipalities of Mexico * Toluca Municipality * Flag of Mexico (state) ==References== Toluca Toluca Category:Flags with coats of arms Category:Toluca Category:Symbols of Mexico (state) Category:Flags with green, red and white
